explains: adj. 伪造的，假冒的；<古>假装的，虚假的
v. 伪造，仿造；佯作，假装；酷似
wordGroup: counterfeit products 假货；仿造产品

sentences.en: Are you aware these notes are counterfeit?
sentences.cn: 你觉察到这些钞票是伪造的吗？

sentences.en: He admitted possessing and delivering counterfeit currency.
sentences.cn: 他承认持有和运送了假币。

sentences.en: It is a crime to counterfeit money.
